analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The three-based text in forward and reverse order according to the ideas

original: 13.16. Maggārammaṇattika🔽Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: magga ārammaṇa ttika  magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇa  dhammam paṭicca na magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇam dhamma
translated: .. The triad based on the path as object🔽With a path as object as condition, a non-path as object idea arises, a condition being by way of root condition. With a path as object🔽condition, a non-path as cause idea arises, a condition being by way of root condition. With a path as object

original: paṭicca namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽namaggārammaṇo ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca na magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca  na magga ārammaṇaḥ ca na magga adhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇa
translated: condition, a non-path as dominant idea arises, a condition being by way of root condition. With a path as object condition,🔽a non-path as object and a non-path as dominant idea arise, a condition being by way of root condition. With a path as object

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na magga hetukaḥ ca na magga adhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ ca na magga hetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
translated: condition, a non-path as cause and a non-path as dominant idea arise, a condition being by way of root condition.🔽With a path as object condition, a non-path as object and a non-path as cause idea arise, a condition being by way of root condition. With a path as object condition,

original: hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati
analyzed: hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ ca na magga hetuko ca na magga adhipati
translated: a non-path as object and a non-path as cause and a non-path as dominant idea arise, a condition being by way of root condition.
and from these five things these five things arise. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañcatisa ārammaṇe chabbīsa pe avigate pañcatisa sabbattha vitthāretabba
translated: From a cause thirty-five, from object twenty-six … from non-disappearance thirty-five. (Everywhere in detail.)
